name: Blot (itch)
description:
Blot is a cancelled Gravity Platformer that was in develpment in 2011.

This demo consists in five levels ranging from easy to difficult in order to show how the game would progress.

Everything was made by me aside from the soundtrack, which was made by a friend of mine. 

CONTROLS: 

- Arrow keys to move, ENTER(RETURN) key to enter the doors. For the rest it's important playing the tutorial.

Thank you for playing.
